description:
Fish is often sold as the perfect climate-friendly dinner: highly nutritious and lower carbon than other forms of protein. But new research is increasingly bringing some of these eco marketing claims into question. In part, because industrial fishing – scientists and campaigners say – is weakening the ocean’s ability to act as a carbon sink.  […]

The post Industrial Fishing Undermines World’s Greatest Carbon Sink, Experts Warn appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Industrial Fishing Undermines World’s Greatest Carbon Sink, Experts Warn
